description:
The Special Sword Administration Bureau is a Japanese government office affiliated with the National Police Agency that serves to oversee and regulate the actions of http://anidb.net/t7097 [toji] and organize operations against http://anidb.net/t7100 [aradama]. The bureau is currently led by Commander http://anidb.net/ch90627 [Origami Yukari], and its headquarters is located at Kamakura City.
Source: Toji no Miko Wiki
name: Tokubetsu Touken-Rui Kanrikyoku
